mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dimission(emp_ID, emp_name, gender,pos_ID, pos_name, dep_ID, dep_name, date,confirm_date, dim_date, dim_reason) VALUES (#{emp_ID}, #{emp_name}, #{gender},#{pos_ID}, #{pos_name}, #{dep_ID}, #{dep_name}, #{date},#{confirm_date}, #{dim_date}, #{dim_reason});
insert into dimission(emp_ID, dim_date, dim_reason ) values (#{emp_ID}, #{dim_date}, #{dim_reason} ) DELETE FROM employee WHERE emp_ID = #{emp_ID};
mapper.select: SELECT dim.emp_ID, dim.dim_date, dim.dim_reason, dim.emp_name, dim.gender, dim.dep_ID, dim.dep_name, dim.pos_ID, dim.pos_name, dim.date, dim.confirm_date FROM dimission dim WHERE dim.pos_ID = #{pos_ID};

SELECT dim.emp_ID, dim.dim_date, dim.dim_reason, dim.emp_name, dim.gender, dim.dep_ID, dim.dep_name, dim.pos_ID, dim.pos_name, dim.date, dim.confirm_date FROM dimission dim WHERE dim.dep_ID = #{dep_ID};
